<template>
  <nav>
    <router-link :to="{name: 'Home'}">Home</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name: 'AllData'}">All Data</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name: 'Recordings'}">Recordings</router-link>
  </nav>
  <router-view/>
</template>

<script>
import {ref} from "vue";
import getMqttClient from "@/composables/getMqttClient";

export default {
  setup() {

    let {mqttClient, eventz} = getMqttClient();
    console.log('eu...')

    function sleep(milliseconds) {
      const date = Date.now();
      let currentDate = null;
      do {
        currentDate = Date.now();
      } while (currentDate - date < milliseconds);
    }

    function um(mqttClient, eventz){
      if(typeof mqttClient !== 'undefined'){
        console.log(mqttClient)
        eventz("connect", () => {
          console.log('Connected...')
        })
      }
      else {
        sleep(500)
        console.log("slept")
        um(mqttClient, eventz)
      }
    }

    um(mqttClient, eventz)

  }
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav {
  padding: 30px;
}

nav a {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
